title: 原來而家香港人去葡萄牙旅行唔洗quarantine

replies.msg:
今晚睇過下除左係人都知既大英祖國之外, 香港人去葡萄牙, Dubai同土耳其都唔洗quarantine
唔計轉機轉到暈既南美同冇人想去既非洲, 歐亞仲有冇國家係唔洗quarantine就可以比香港人去旅行?
法國都唔洗
阿富汗 巴基斯坦

quote.msg: 法國都唔洗

replies.msg:
其實香港唔係法國既exemption list 上wor

1. If you are arriving from a country on the list below, you can enter metropolitan France without any COVID-19 restrictions.

Member States of the European Union, Andorra, Australia, the Holy See, Iceland, Japan, Liechtenstein, Monaco, New Zealand, Norway, Rwanda, San Marino, South Korea, Singapore, Switzerland, Thailand and the United Kingdom.

理論上去英國轉機就入得, 因為佢話 from 呢D country而唔係 national of those countries

replies.msg:
要咩? quarantine?
照咁睇香港飛就入都唔唔比入, 但其實而家都冇曬直航
英國轉機理論上入得同唔洗quarantine, 因為佢話arriving from a country on the list below can enter France without any restrictions, 冇話要係英國national

反而荷蘭就唔得, 因為荷蘭調返轉話係睇你既nationality而唔係邊到出發
就算揸BNO係EU國家眼中都唔係UK national
暫時都仲有travel ban, 除非有resident permits, 唔係都係上唔到機

quote.msg: 暫時都仲有travel ban, 除非有resident permits, 唔係都係上唔到機
